icons.src: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 192 192'%3E%3Crect width='192' height='192' fill='%2300ff88' rx='20'/%3E%3Cg transform='translate(96,96)'%3E%3C!-- Ascending bars --%3E%3Crect x='-60' y='20' width='16' height='40' fill='%23ffffff' rx='2'/%3E%3Crect x='-35' y='5' width='16' height='55' fill='%23ffffff' rx='2'/%3E%3Crect x='-10' y='-10' width='16' height='70' fill='%23ffffff' rx='2'/%3E%3Crect x='15' y='-25' width='16' height='85' fill='%23ffffff' rx='2'/%3E%3Crect x='40' y='-40' width='16' height='100' fill='%23ffffff' rx='2'/%3E%3C!-- Upward arrow --%3E%3Cg transform='rotate(-30)'%3E%3Cline x1='-20' y1='20' x2='35' y2='-25' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='4' stroke-linecap='round'/%3E%3Cpolygon points='35,-25 25,-20 30,-30' fill='%23ffffff'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E

data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 512 512'%3E%3Ccircle cx='256' cy='256' r='256' fill='%2300ff88'/%3E%3Cg transform='translate(256,256)'%3E%3C!-- Ascending bars within safe zone --%3E%3Crect x='-120' y='40' width='32' height='80' fill='%23ffffff' rx='4'/%3E%3Crect x='-60' y='10' width='32' height='110' fill='%23ffffff' rx='4'/%3E%3Crect x='0' y='-20' width='32' height='140' fill='%23ffffff' rx='4'/%3E%3Crect x='60' y='-50' width='32' height='170' fill='%23ffffff' rx='4'/%3E%3Crect x='120' y='-80' width='32' height='200' fill='%23ffffff' rx='4'/%3E%3C!-- Large upward trending arrow --%3E%3Cg transform='rotate(-25)'%3E%3Cline x1='-80' y1='60' x2='100' y2='-60' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='8' stroke-linecap='round'/%3E%3Cpolygon points='100,-60 75,-45 85,-75' fill='%23ffffff'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E
